Detailed Description

A class indicating the application criteria for selecting a location provider.

Providers maybe ordered according to accuracy, power usage, ability to report altitude, speed, and bearing, and monetary cost.

Definition at line 27 of file Criteria.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::connectivity::Criteria::Criteria ( )

Constructs a new Criteria object.

The new object will have no requirements on accuracy, power, or response time; will not require altitude, speed, or bearing; and will not allow monetary cost.
